title: Haunted Pixel 3A XL
content:
My Pixel opens random apps, goes grayscale in an unsolicited app, won't load links, is basically pissing me off and I want my 2XL back. 

I have the latest update, my storage is only half full and I reboot about every three days, when I get irked and don't know what else to try. Active edge is off. 

Halp?
